entry.content:
Across

  2. Perennial Indian state with loyal following (4-3)
  3. Talisker perhaps overpoured for VIP? (3,4)
  4. Quality or quisling? (7)

  11. Vacuous guy, married and endlessly unpleasant to Biles, maybe (7)

entry.content:
Across

  1. They pick up after business cards (6)
  2. In a state, unstable element (8)

  10. American parent graduates at a Kenyan location (7)
